mapper.select: SELECT id FROM account WHERE account_name = ( SELECT merchant_account FROM merchant WHERE merchant_id = #{merchantId} )

SELECT asub.location detailAddress, ac.mobile contactNumber, ac.realName personInCharge, m.merchant_name tracePointName, ac.id accountId FROM account ac LEFT JOIN account_sub_merchant asub on asub.account_id = ac.id LEFT JOIN merchant m on m.merchant_id = asub.merchant_id where ac.id = #{accountId}

SELECT CONCAT(c.country,p.province,ci.city,a.area,m.merchant_detail_site) detailAddress, ac.mobile contactNumber, ac.realName personInCharge, m.merchant_name tracePointName, ac.id accountId FROM merchant m LEFT JOIN account ac on ac.account_name = m.merchant_account LEFT JOIN country c on c.countryID = SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(m.administrative_division_full_site,',',1),',',- 1) LEFT JOIN province p on p.provinceID = SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(m.administrative_division_full_site,',',2),',',- 1) LEFT JOIN city ci on ci.cityID = SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(m.administrative_division_full_site,',',3),',',- 1) LEFT JOIN area a on a.areaID = SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(m.administrative_division_full_site,',',4),',',- 1) where ac.id = #{accountId}

SELECT a.mobile contactNumber, a.realName personInCharge, adn.location detailAddress, adn.trace_point tracePointName, a.id accountId FROM account a LEFT JOIN account_distribute_node adn ON a.id = adn.account_id where a.id = #{accountId}

SELECT a.mobile contactNumber, a.realName personInCharge, adn.location detailAddress, adn.trace_another_name tracePointName, a.id accountId FROM account a LEFT JOIN account_distribute_node adn ON a.id = adn.account_id where a.id = #{accountId}

SELECT a.mobile contactNumber, a.realName personInCharge, adn.location detailAddress, adn.trace_point tracePointName, a.id accountId FROM account a LEFT JOIN account_distribute_node adn ON a.id = adn.account_id where a.mobile = #{mobile}
SELECT a.id AS accountId, a.realName FROM account_sub_merchant asm LEFT JOIN account a ON a.id=asm.account_id WHERE 1=1 AND asm.merchant_id=#{merchantId} AND a.status=1 AND a.role_id=9
